data.title: Shiner
data.meta_description: Shiner TexHex Bruja's Brew IPA - 7% ABV Pete      Solid IPA - came off a little malty for me and some weird flavor too - maybe that was the cactus. ​Ratings: Pete - 3 Shyoh's
data.text:
Shiner TexHex Bruja's Brew

IPA - 7% ABV

Pete

Solid IPA - came off a little malty for me and some weird flavor too - maybe that was the cactus.

​Ratings: Pete - 3 Shyoh's

Shiner 101 Czech Style Pilsner

Pilsner - 4.6% ABV

Pete

This is a solid, smooth, easy to drink pils. Not a ton of flavor, but it's not meant to have a ton of flavor.

Ratings: Pete - 4 Shyoh's

Shiner Bock

Bock - 4.4% ABV

Pete

This is a pretty good beer. It has some good sweetness to it going down and a very clean finish.

Ratings: Pete - 4 Shyoh's

Shiner Bohemian Black Lager

Dark Lager - 4.9% ABV

Pete

This is a pretty solid beer. It has the drinkability of a European lager, plus some nice dark malty flavors. The first sip was pretty bland for me, but it grew on me as it went down and those malts kicked in.

Ratings: Pete - 5 Shyoh's

Shiner Kosmos Reserve

Lager - 4.98% ABV

Pete

I can't figure out this beer. When you take a sip, it feels like a bunch of flavor is about to hit you, but it just never shows up. It's a bit disappointing.

Ratings: Pete - 3 Shyoh's

Shiner Premium Beer

Golden Lager - 4.5% ABV

Pete

This one looks and tastes like a crappy light beer. Skip it.

Ratings: Pete - 2 Shyoh's

Shiner Ruby Redbird

Fruit Beer - 4.01% ABV

Pete

I don't taste grapefruit at all in this beer, but I sure do taste ginger. It is more ginger-y than ginger ale for sure. It is incredibly easy to drink, and quite good if you like ginger.

​Ratings: Pete - 5 Shyoh's

Shiner Sea Salt & Lime

Light Lager - 4% ABV

Pete

Would be the ideal drink to chase a shot of tequila with. Hint of lime, easy drinking, not much flavor. Probably better options if you're not doing the tequila with it, but to each their own.

​Ratings: Pete - 4 Shyoh's

Shiner White Wing

Belgian Witbier - 4.7% ABV

Pete

This is a pretty solid wit. It's more flavorful than a Blue Moon, but not nearly as much as, say Allagash. Still, quite good.

Ratings: Pete - 5 Shyoh's
